metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0844 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The WML/Lua API in Battle for Wesnoth 1.7.x through 1.11.x and 1.12.xbefore 1.12.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted(1) campaign or (2) map file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wesnoth - 1:1.10.7-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
wesnoth-1.10 - 1:1.10.7-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
wesnoth-1.10-aoi - 1:1.10.7-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
wesnoth-1.10-core - 1:1.10.7-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
wesnoth-1.10-data - 1:1.10.7-1ubuntu0.14.04.1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: wesnoth-1.10 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.7-1ubuntu0.14.04.1').
